Name: Landmarks, Arverne East Building D - Rental, Article XI, Queens (G 250087 XAQ).
Title: Application number G 250087 XAQ (Arverne East Building D - Rental, Article XI) submitted by the Department of Housing Preservation and Development, pursuant to Section 577 of the Private Housing Finance Law, requesting approval of an exemption from real property taxation for the development known as Arverne East (Block 15862, p/o Lot 1 (Tentative Lot 1001-1003, 1005); Block 15862, Lot 3 (Tentative Lot 1007); and Block 15876, Lots 3 and 5 (Tentative Lots 1006 and 1008)), Borough of Queens, Community District 14, Council District 31.
BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Sitings and Dispositions

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
